content: Love the setting, graphics are nice, story is well written and music is great! Only problem is that gameplay is really, really dull.
I equip the cops and as it loads 2nd mission crashes constantly.
Excessive use of the F word that can't be easily muted.

Good game, but tedious. The levels are repetitive and add no challenge or experience. AI is dumb and basically run into your bullets or don't notice you until you're breathing on them. There actually is a survival mode, which demos how bad the AI is. Weird design choices too, like XCOM style overwatch having a cost that gets replenished when you arrest enough people. It feels like it should be some cop simulator, but also is much too arcadey. And yet is too slow paced to be an arcade game.

This game seems like it has a really fun premise and I like the actual game, but this is really ruined by the design. The 3rd level of the game, The Estate, is HUGE. I couldn't finish it in one go, so I saved as I had been doing the whole time, and then returned to the game earlier. All progress was gone. It was not saved, and it wanted me to start the level over. This would be annoying with any normal level, but this one was enormous and I was a while in, so this was awful. I can't recommend.
Amazing game with a beautiful soundtrack. Have lost hours in this game

Great game, but you don't seem to be able to restart a level from the beginning once started. I didn't equip my cops with the right gear and am now stuck until i can get them all killed to restart the level. The graphics are good, but the entire map in night time levels is very dim and brown which makes it pretty difficult to see any details such as hedges to hide behind
Nice idea but overly difficult leading to a frustrating experience
One of the best games but hard missions

Gameplay: Even better than This Is The Police 2, amazing, exciting and realistic combat/stealth, no issues since everything would be the player's fault for bad planning (though saving is abit weird). Graphics: Also better than This Is The Police 2, really no actual issues with this either. Sound: The sound design could be better to be honest but still pretty good. Story: Similar to This Is The Police 2 but I do like the fact that there are more choices. Keep up the great work HandyGames devs!
Love the game so much I went and got it on steam. I've been trying to find a game like this since wasteland 2
Huh?

#ACAB Defund the Police, seriously media like this that GLORIFIES those thugs with badges and a gun should be boycotted. Thankfully due to play pass I didn't pay one dime. Shame devs Shame.... Or maybe yall devs are racist Trump supporters?
There is no buy store in. Very long game and one mistake, you done.
This game was so much fun, the strategy in it was a blast, I also like how you can do most missions stealth which some games like this don't offer.

An amazing spin-off. Narratively, it isn't as good as TITP1 and 2, but the gameplay is fun and complex enough to keep you interested. The story, while minimal, also acts as a kind of sequel to the story of the two previous games, so fans of those will be pleased. Definitely recommended.
Fun but so frustrating.. game is insanely difficult even on easy!
Absolute garbage
This game sucks
Great game, reminds me of the awesome Jagged Alliance. Very easy to mess up your plans with a mis-click, but overall excellent.
Tactical, quad, turn based game about good cops fighting with bad cops. Very good. Difficult.
Very intense game ...i love it...
Excellent
Very slow paced
A lot of fun! Although I think there should be an easy difficulty

Pretty neat game to play here, I do feel the game graphics could obviously use some improvement's, possibly a better variety of weapons and choices to choose from and one last thing is that I believe they made it too easy once you realize that you can just keep saving your progress as u go along rather than needing to make it to a check point or otherwise having to start over the mission; however, overall it's really a great game to try and different from many of the others out there 👍👍👍👍.
replyContent:
Hey there,
and sorry for the trouble. Which bugs exactly are you talking about? If you encounter bugs that that ruin your game experience, please reach out to us at support@handy-games.com and describe them to us, so we can look into the issue.
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: Way too fiddly. Copies Xcom... but more of the bad bits. Really easy to move the wrong unit. Starts with 6 units when you don't want more than 4 yet. Map doesn't zoom and reorient the way EW does. Too involved moving all the units, constantly saving because you're SURE to move the wrong one. Enemies not all that interesting. Too much tedium for not enough reward

Very outdated approach to tactical games, with cops starting not only weak, but without any chance of player choices or character creation. Missions are lengthy, because the game did not learn ANYTING from the progress of the last 25 years. I find my time too precious to play such. Bad gamemastery, lack of consideration what players enjoy. AGAIN.
One of the best games I've played
Boring, slow, stupid
This game is pretty, but is fiddly and slow on a phone. Clearly well thought out, but simply not my "cup of tea".
Coming from a big XCOM background this game is super fun. the missions are rather long, but that doesnt distract from the game itself.
Amazing Game! Not too difficult as some people suggest, they obviously are used to playing candy crush or something lol

This would have been a perfect xcom-style game if it wasn't for one flaw: mission length. The named characters, interesting gameplay style, ridiculous powers and excellent visuals are held back by the missions being long to the point of being tedious. As it stands it's not egregious enough to take a star off, and it's mitigated somewhat by the very generous save system. My biggest problem is with the elimination missions where you have to neutralize all enemies and they can be annoying to find
Is there any new missions?
Great game

This really could be great but its not. Like others say even on easiest level too hard, cant skip tutorial 1st mission which you need to do when restarting. Icons too small and vague so no idea what some of them are, and easy to kill civilians and not know who are enemy. UI just not clear enough to figure out what needs doing.
Hallo I've got a problem But can I contact you via mail? Bc I couldn't find I mail😁😁😁 if you see this pls give mail.
replyContent:
Hey there,
and sorry for the trouble. You can contact us at support@handy-games.com.
Knid regards,
HG-Support

content: Each mission really takes too long and the map is really big. Its doable, yes. But I would've really preferred to play more shorter missions than a few long ones. That being said, I really enjoyed the game!

Edit: you guys need more weapons like ARs... come on don't say cops don't use them. Lmao I've been anticipating this app for a long time. Great job hope you guys add plenty of DLC like maps weapons perks and skirmish(Door Kickers). A random map generator mode. $h*t like Xcom lol. The map lengths are fine it adds to the excitement, don't let 'em get in your head XP. Maybe a slot or two for cops. 5 stars, obviously. Oh, a super easy mode where your guys revive after a few turns, for the pu$$ys😹.

UPDATE-So I went back and restarted the game to make sure i chose the easiest difficulty. So after doing that, I have to say that this game IS ridiculously hard. It took me probably 15 tries to finally get passed the very 1st mission (not the tutorial one). And as of right now, I am STILL stuck on the 2nd mission and have tried to pass it at least 10 times now. Not only is this game hard, but each mission literally takes like at least an hour. I really like the game but why is it so dang hard??
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! There are actually 3 difficulty levels to choose from at the start of the game. Did you perhaps chose a hard one by accident? Though I don't think that setting impacts the first mission too much. Kind regards,

content: Finished the game. Love it. Anyone who loves tactical and turn based games with hour and hours of play time... Should try the game.
I love it and the endless mode but can you make a thing were you have to deal with crimes on the map and send cops to crime but an endless version
Great tactical game with many skills, perks and scenarios.
Game is hard but rewarding. Good turn based tactical fun.

Its a bit hard of a game for me though i do enjoy playing it. The graphics are good though there is no way to rotate the screen so its tough to see cover sometimes. Everything else about this game seems good so far

A full 5 on 5. As perfect as I had expected. This one is a masterpiece, thank you for bringing this for us on android. I would purchase more if you made more games like this. Maybe a Mafia tactical game too, just a suggestion. Keep up the good work guys. Full worth for my money👍
Hard game. Bit pricey for very little
This would be a great game, but there are way many bugs.... DONT PURCHASE
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. But it would be very nice to know which problems you are referring to, so that we can try to fix them. If possible contact us via support@handy-games.com so that we can help. Thank you!

content: Wow so hard
Great Game.. Love It :)

I love the game but sometimes I feel like the mission are too long and hard to do. I had a problem where I was basically at the end of the game so I went to save my progress but accidentally pushed the button "restart mission". Then when I tried to go to my other checkpoints that I saved, they were all gone... now I had to restart the whole mission when I was so close to beating the game. All that i'm asking for is that you still have all your saved progress even though you restart the mission.

Superb game. Bought This is the police and This is the police 2 and rebel Cops on PS4.... now bought all 3 for android.... Really great games, well made well thought out.... Absolute must buy! 5 star would give it more if I could. Cheers
Very fun well made game enjoying it very much.
Thanks for release this game in playstore... already buy all series. Now, I'm start to play this game. Everything is good.
My new addiction
Awesome game!!
